title: Digital Forensics: Tracking Hoax Bomb Threats
description: This course covers digital forensics and OSINT techniques to track and analyze hoax bomb threats across social media, email, and online forums.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials for Threat Intelligence
description: Learn the foundational principles of cybersecurity, including network security, malware analysis, and threat intelligence to prevent and respond to digital threats.

title: OSINT Techniques for Threat Investigation
description: Master open-source intelligence (OSINT) gathering methods to collect and analyze public data from the internet for threat investigation purposes.
